mapper.select: SELECT GENERAL_POST_ID , POST_WRITER , BOARD_ID , POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_DATE , LIKE_CNT , VIEW_CNT , DELETE_YN FROM GENERAL_POST ORDER BY GENERAL_POST_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(GC.GENERAL_COMMENT_ID) COMMENT_CNT , GP.GENERAL_POST_ID FROM GENERAL_POST GP LEFT JOIN GENERAL_COMMENT GC ON GC.GENERAL_POST_ID = GP.GENERAL_POST_ID GROUP BY GP.GENERAL_POST_ID
SELECT M.NICKNAME , M.EMAIL , GP.GENERAL_POST_ID FROM GENERAL_POST GP INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON GP.POST_WRITER = M.EMAIL
SELECT * FROM GENERAL_POST GP WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{_parameter} ORDER BY VIEW_CNT DESC

SELECT CC.CODE_CONTENT , GP.GENERAL_POST_ID FROM GENERAL_POST GP INNER JOIN GENERAL_POST_HASHTAG GPH ON GP.GENERAL_POST_ID = GPH.GENERAL_POST_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.CODE_ID = GPH.HASHTAG_ID WHERE GP.GENERAL_POST_ID = #{_parameter}
